scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && nwb build-react-component
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated changelog' && git push origin master
scripts.publish-major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push --tags && sleep 5 && npm run changelog && npm run gh-pages-upload
scripts.publish-minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push --tags && sleep 5 && npm run changelog && npm run gh-pages-upload
scripts.publish-patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push --tags && sleep 5 && npm run changelog && npm run gh-pages-upload
